name: Hotdog Man's Delicious Intent: A Stealth Advertising Campaign for Ghost Pepper Frankfurters
name_original: Hotdog Man's Delicious Intent: A Stealth Advertising Campaign for Ghost Pepper Frankfurters
description:
Sneak up on unsuspecting customers and place Hotdog Man's Ghost Pepper Frankfurter in their pocket. Win by standing next to the Target to fill up the  Ketchup Splat indicating success.

Don't let them see or hear you, though! The 'Sus Meter' will go up with every suspicious activity. Get a full Sus Meter and it's Game Over!

Interactable objects are highlighted by a Mustard Bottle  when you're close enough. Interact with objects to hide behind cover

Controls

  • WASD - Move
  • Shift - Run (but will increase the Sus Meter from the sound you make!)
  • Space - Interact with nearby objects to avoid suspicion
  • M - Toggle music
  • N - Toggle sound effects

Contributors

  • bricAbrac - Programming / Sound
  • softcereal - Art
  • sleepyUFO - Music

Made in one week for the Brackeys 2022.2 game jam.
